turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want to place an order for pick up at Starbucks on 188 Street in Fresh Meadows, New York.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. let's do that. What type of drink.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. I'd like to get a large.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, a large cinnamon shortbread latte add with cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, do you have a milk preference?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. let me confirm your order with you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Venti hot cinnamon shortbread latte with whipped cream to be picked up at Starbucks on 188 street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, would you like to place the order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your drink has been ordered. It will be ready for pick up shortly. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message. Enjoy!
